CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK(DSO_Sub_Status_Selected__c)||ISBLANK(DSO_Sub_Status_Ended__c)) && (DSO_Sub_Status_Ended__c - DSO_Sub_Status_Selected__c) >0, ROUND((DSO_Sub_Status_Ended__c - DSO_Sub_Status_Selected__c)*24,2), IF (NOT(ISBLANK(DSO_Sub_Status_Selected__c)),ROUND(( Now() - DSO_Sub_Status_Selected__c ) * 24, 2), Null))
CustomField.label: Time in DSO Sub-Status
